sentences.en: Aggressive and premature pursuit of this information may antagonize the wholesaler and poison the relationship.
sentences.cn: 太激进或不成熟的追求会引起批发商反感,有害于关系.

sentences.en: But EBM cannot antagonize the arrhythmia induced by adrenaline in rabbits.
sentences.cn: 但不能对抗肾上腺素诱发的家兔心律失常.

sentences.en: Conclusion: F 2 can antagonize the arrhythmias induced by ischemia - reperfusion in rat heart.
sentences.cn: 结论: F2对大鼠心脏缺血再灌注心律失常具有拮抗作用.

sentences.en: He didn't want to antagonize her.

sentences.cn: 他一定不能让米切扫兴.

sentences.en: I advise you not to antagonize him.
It would be dangerous to antagonize him.
Noise jammer is one of the primary jamming that radar seekers have to antagonize.
sentences.cn: 噪声干扰是雷达导引头需要对付的主要干扰形式之一.

sentences.en: Not wishing to antagonize her further, he said no more.
sentences.cn: 他不愿惹她更生气，便不再说话。

sentences.en: The church settlement she effected was planned to antagonize as few people as possible.
sentences.cn: 她在解决教会问题时,注意到尽可能少得罪人.

sentences.en: The experiment above confirmes that sodium ferulate can antagonize ETB on Ast and displays protective function.
sentences.cn: 上述实验证实,阿魏酸钠可拮抗星形胶质细胞上的ETB发挥保护作用.

sentences.en: Trace HCS also could antagonize partially the inhibition of IFN to CFU - GM.
sentences.cn: 微量的氢化可的松也能部分阻断IFN的 CFU -GM抑制.

sentences.en: Your aggressive promoting of philosophic or religious viewpoints may antagonize others.
sentences.cn: 你的冲动促进哲学性或宗教观点可能会触怒他人.

words.tran_cn: 敌对的；对抗性的；反对的
敌手；[解剖] 对抗肌；[生化] 拮抗物；反协同试剂

trans.tran_en: to annoy someone very much by doing something that they do not like

trans.tran_cn: 使成为敌人，引起…敌对[对抗]，对…起反作用，中和
